Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ecinga	ukuba	ubutyebi	bakhe	buza	kumenza	aphile ngonaphakade
Nakanye! Uya kuphoswa koko kuqhawula (izinto) zibe zizicwibi
Yintoni na enokukuchazela okokuba yintoni na eqhawula (izinto) zibe zizicwibi
